name: Gabriel Espinheira
title: Software Engineer
description: A software engineer with a passion to turn good ideas into aesthetic products.
keywords: software engineer, senior software engineer, developer, front-end, back-end, full stack, ux/ui design, javascript, typescript, nodejs, reactjs, nextjs, tailwindcss

home.title: Hi, my name is
home.subtitle: I'm a Creative Software Engineer
home.description: I’m a senior software engineer with a passion for technology and digital products. I first discovered my love for development while playing around with HTML and CSS when I was 16yo. I am dedicated to continuously improving my development skills, and am committed to producing high-quality, efficient and user-centric digital products. I take pride in my ability to understand business objectives and translate them into a seamless and intuitive user experience.
home.quote: If you have a project that would be a good fit for my skills and experience, I would love to hear from you!

experience.description: We are Mollie, a finance industry pioneer and one of Europe’s fastest-growing fintechs. We believe that every business has the right to grow, and that drives us to create products that simplify financial services – effortless payments, flexible financing, powerful integrations, and more.

Working for a real estate investment fund focused on building and maintaining a property management solution, connecting with various external services such as Airbnb and Booking, using mainly NodeJs with Typescript and PostgreSQL.
Building an NFT collaborative subscription platform to connect Artists around the world and Customers using mainly NodeJs, GraphQL, Web3 and AWS Services.

Working as a Software Engineer, in the most recognized investment firms in Brazil. Mainly building solutions like Back-end API architecture and building a scalable and reusable front-end with NextJS, using methodologies like Atomic Design. Using ReactJS, NextJS, Typescript, Serverless, PHP and WordPress.

My work was mainly focused on building Proofs of Concept and web services, creating new features, performing A/B tests and user research, in addition to building a technology team culture. Using technologies like ReactJS, NodeJS, React Native, MySQL and WordPress.

Building and maintenance of features for a management system for medical clinics, serving clients throughout Brazil. Some of the important results were: implementation of unit and integration tests, participation in the creation of layouts with the design team and suggestion of new technologies and design patterns.

Working with clients of different sizes, mainly building websites, portfolios, e-commerces, APIs, management systems and integrations with external services. Working most of my time with Javascript and PHP.

Digital Marketing Agency, working as a Developer, focused on website construction and sales landing pages, as well as integrations with external services through APIs. Using the best practices of HTML and CSS to ensure the SEO and responsive layout, working in different devices.
